mapper.insert: insert into CI_Issue (issueNum, issueType, issueOpt, issueTitle, issueContent, issueFile, issueWriter, issueDate, issueEndDate, issueStmt, issueManager, issueDpmt, issueClearStep, issueRefuse) values(issueNum_Auto.NEXTVAL, #{issueType}, #{issueOpt}, #{issueTitle}, #{issueContent}, #{issueFile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueWriter}, SYSDATE, null, '등록', null, #{issueDpmt}, null, null)
mapper.select: select issueNum, issueType, issueOpt, issueTitle, issueContent, issueFile, issueWriter, issueDate, issueEndDate, issueStmt, issueManager, issueDpmt, issueClearStep, issueRefuse, r from (select issueNum, issueType, issueOpt, issueTitle, issueContent, issueFile, issueWriter, issueDate, issueEndDate, issueStmt, issueManager, issueDpmt, issueClearStep, issueRefuse, ROWNUM r from (select issueNum, issueType, issueOpt, issueTitle, issueContent, issueFile, issueWriter, issueDate, issueEndDate, issueStmt, issueManager, issueDpmt, issueClearStep, issueRefuse from CI_Issue order by issueNum DESC) order by issueNum DESC) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
select * from CI_Issue where issueManager=#{userId} and issueStmt = '등록'
update CI_Issue set issueStmt ='진행' where issueNum = #{issueNum}

select issueType, issueOpt, issueTitle, issueContent, issueWriter, issueFile, issueDate, issueEndDate, issueStmt, issueManager , issueDpmt, issueClearStep, issueRefuse from CI_Issue where issueWriter=#{userId} and issueRefuse='refuse'
